      • getPlayer

      • getLevel

        public int getLevel()
        Get the current level of the game.
        Returns:

      • getPoints

        public String getPoints()
        Removing the "thumb up"- or "thumb down"-picture. Get points as a String.
        Returns:
        points

      • setPoints

        public void setPoints()
        Increases points based on current level and gives a "thumb up". Counter resets after five consecutive right answers. And new level's been reached.

      • decPoints

        public void decPoints()
        Takes back to start of current level. In other words, removes earned points and resets counter. Also giving a "thumb down".

      • getCalc

        public String getCalc()
